title: Regenerate Candid declarations for clearBoardroom method

requirements.summary: Synchronize the frontend Candid declarations (.did.js and .did.d.ts files) so that the React app can recognize and call the clearBoardroom method without 'Actor missing' errors
acceptanceCriteria: The frontend .did.js file includes the clearBoardroom method
The frontend .did.d.ts TypeScript declarations include the clearBoardroom method signature
The useClearBoardroom hook can successfully call the backend method without type errors

file_operations.description: Regenerate the Candid JavaScript interface declarations to include the clearBoardroom method exported from backend/main.mo actor interface
Regenerate the TypeScript type declarations to include the clearBoardroom method signature with proper return type (Promise<void>)
Update the backend interface TypeScript declarations to ensure clearBoardroom method signature is present and matches the regenerated Candid declarations
